about_the_game:
Embark on an epic adventure as Sebastian Harrington, a passionate archeology grad student turned explorer, in search of his missing professor. Six weeks ago, Dr. Albert J. Montgomery III announced the discovery of a hidden temple, but he never returned. Now, Sebastian must dive into ancient temple ruins, solve intricate puzzles, and uncover hidden secrets. Will you reveal the mysteries within the Temple of Shadows?

STORY AND GAMEPLAY

Navigate the enigmatic Temple Ruins and unlock the secrets of the Temple Gate. Venture into the labyrinthine caves beyond, a realm filled with ancient mysteries and hidden dangers. Your mission: uncover the truth and track down the elusive Dr. Montgomery. Embark on this thrilling adventure and face challenges that will test your courage and wits at every turn. Can you reveal the secrets that lie within?

PUZZLES AND SECRESTS

Prepare to engage your mind with intricate puzzles that will challenge your every move. Manipulate buttons, doors, and moving panels to unlock pathways and reveal hidden secrets.

Harness the power of light machines and light collectors to illuminate your path.

BEWARE OF DANGERS

Along the way, discover hidden passages and collect rare artifacts, each holding secrets that could aid you on your quest—or uncover a deeper mystery. But tread carefully. The temple is alive with dangers: shifting walls, treacherous traps, and ominous shadows waiting to ensnare the unwary. Every step forward could be your last. Will you brave the unknown, or will the temple claim you as its next victim?

CHALLENGE YOUR MIND AND UNCOVER THE SECRETS

Each puzzle is a test of your ingenuity, designed to challenge your wits and reward your determination. Hidden within the temple's depths are secrets and collectibles waiting to be uncovered by those clever and persistent enough to seek them out. Solve ancient puzzles, unlock forbidden chambers, and piece together the story of the shadows. Will you rise to the challenge and unravel the temple’s mysteries, or will its secrets remain buried forever?

COLLECTABLES AND SPEED-RUN MODE

Uncover the mysteries of Temple of Shadows by collecting hidden relics, including ancient Drawings, Gold Statues, and the Professor's personal belongings. Each item reveals a deeper layer of the story and the madness lurking within the temple. For the ultimate challenge, test your skills in Speedrun challenge—perfect your path, solve puzzles with precision, and race against the clock to set your best time. Can you conquer the shadows faster than anyone else? 

EXPLORE AND DISCOVER

Look for new pathways to uncover hidden areas and unlock the temple's most guarded secrets. Every step off the beaten path could lead to rare and valuable items, rewarding the bold and curious. Will you uncover treasures long forgotten, or leave them hidden in the shadows? The choice is yours.

A TEST OF WITS AND SANITY

Temple of Shadows will push your ingenuity to its limits while keeping you on edge at every turn. The uncertainty of what lies ahead—be it danger, mystery, or madness—might unravel your resolve before you ever find your way out. Do you have the strength to face the unknown, or will the shadows claim your mind?

name: Temple of Shadows

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4690 / AMD FX 4350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 2060 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 4770k / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 3060 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 13 GB available space

short_description: Join Sebastian Harrington, an archeology student, on a quest to find his missing professor. Explore ancient temple ruins, solve puzzles, and uncover hidden secrets in the Temple of Shadows.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
